name: Zombie Redemption
description:
Will you be accepted here like "these"? A game about zombie identity. "So, because you are lukewarm—neither hot nor cold—I am about to spit you out of my mouth." (Revelation 3:16)

This game was developed in 4 hours specially for the Tinderbox PlayAway Games Festival - Bitsy One-Day Jam which theme was "zombies & music".

Design and music by Anselmo A. Peretto
